title: JENNIE LIU Womens 100% Cashmere Scarf
features: hand wash cold, lay flat to dry or dry clean
Multi color matches a wide range of your exsiting wardrobes
woven with the finiest cashmere for superior soft and cozy
description: This is an all time classic piece of cashmere scarf for women, large check design from light to shades of black gives this woven cashmere scarf a very subtle look, great to accentuate your favorite wardrobes.Can be worn in a variety of different ways to create different looks in seconds if you learn a little basics on how to tie a scarf. Super cozy cashmere neck warmer scarf designed to protect you or your loved ones all through the toughest cold weather. Easy to travel anywhere with this cashmere scarf, when rolled up, it can be conveniently put inside your hand bag.
